pageContext.claim: “We have more oil than they do now. You know, we have actually more oil than they do. We're the largest in the world. Isn't that a nice feeling?”
pageContext.analysis: In this context, Trump is referring to Middle Eastern countries. But the United States, which ranks 9th in oil reserves, is still behind Saudi Arabia, Iran, Iraq, Kuwait, and United Arab Emirates. Trump is probably adding in some fantasy figures for unproven reserves in the rctic National Wildlife Refuge.
